price: 6 Il en est ainsi parce qu’Allah est la véritable divinité et qu’Il est Celui qui redonnera vie aux morts et qui a pouvoir sur toute chose,
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلۡحَقُّ وَأَنَّهُۥ يُحۡيِ ٱلۡمَوۡتَىٰ وَأَنَّهُۥ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٞ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: dhālika bi-anna al-laha huwa al-ḥaqu wa-annahu yuḥ'yī al-mawtā wa-annahu ʿalā kulli shayin qadīrun
